title: User can select one player participating in the game to be the game's MVP
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the MVP Ballot
custom_steps: When the user is choosing who to vote for
custom_expected: Then User can select one player participating in the game to be the game's MVP

title: MVP Vote exists in English and Spanish (not Dominican Republic)
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the MVP Ballot
custom_steps:
When the the user access the MVP ballot in EN and ES

https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/all-star/mvp-vote
https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/all-star/mvp-vote
custom_expected: Then the user is presented with the MVP ballot page in the correct language.

title: The MVP Ballot reflects the 2021 endpoint
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the MVP Ballot
custom_expected: Then the ballot reflects the 2021 endpoint.  (e.g. http://betacontent.mlb.com/mlb/en/event/v1/asg2018/asgBallot/web-v1.json)

title: About the Ballot Copy Exists
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the MVP Ballot
custom_steps: When the user scrolls to the bottom of the page.
custom_expected: Then the user is displayed the 2021 'About the Ballot' text.

title: Official Sponsor of the MVP Ballot (Google) is displayed as the Header Banner Image
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the MVP Ballot
custom_steps: When viewing the sponsor of the 2021 MVP Ballot at the page header.
custom_expected: The the header banner image exists.

title: Official title shows: 2021 All-Star Game MVP VOTE
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the MVP Ballot
custom_expected: Then the official title shows [sponsor name] MLB All-Star Ballot

title: User must submit at least one player to submit the ballot
custom_preconds: Given user is viewing the MVP Ballot
custom_steps: When attempting to submit the ballot
custom_expected: Then the user must submit at least one player to submit the ballot

title: Registration Form Fields Exist after Selecting a Player
custom_preconds: Given the user is viewing the MVP Ballot page
custom_steps: When the user votes for a player
custom_expected:
The following fields exist.

-Email Address
-Country
-Birth Date
-Select your favorite team
-Option to receive the MLB.com Newsletter and promotions

title: Submit your Vote button Exists on Form
User has the option to Edit Player Vote after first selecting a player
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the MVP Ballot page and selected a player
custom_steps:
When the player is selected, their hero image with name and team is displayed as well as the option to Edit Selection
When the user selects Edit Selection
custom_expected: Then the user is brought back to the MVP ballot page to make a new selection

title: American and National Leagues are displayed
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the MVP ballot page
custom_steps: When the user looks at the list of players to vote on
custom_expected: Then the user sees the American League and National League list of players

title: Players are displayed with their position, Player Headshot, and stats (Pitchers, Non-Pitchers)
custom_preconds: Given the user is on the MVP Ballot Page
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the list of players (pitchers and non-Pitchers)
custom_expected:
The following is displayed for each player (Pitchers and non-Pitchers): Name, headshot, position
The following stats are displayed for non-pitchers: AVG, HR, RBI, OPS
The following stats are displayed for pitchers: ERA, K, WHIP

title: 728x90 ad is served on the top of the Ballot Page
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the MVP ballot

https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/all-star/mvp-vote
https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/es/all-star/mvp-vote
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the top of the page
custom_expected: Then the user sees a 728x90 ad

title: 728x90 Ad displayed on top of the MVP Ballot Review Page
Back to Top Link Brings the User back to the top of the MVP Ballot Page (vote and review page)
